name: Nuclear Fly
description:
Description

It's a local multiplayer game. Player 1 is a plane and has to kill all 3 flies with it's bombs. Player 2 can shoot lamps (very random, i know). He has to kill the plane with them.

Have fun :D

Controls

Arrow keys/ AD - move (Player 1)

Space - Shoot Bombs (Player 1)

Mouse - Shoot Lamps (Player 2)

Changelog

-Game created
